The following codecs are supported by the wireless radio. Please ensure that connections can be established to networks operating over these codecs.
1. '''Confirm the following wireless network protocols are handled by the wireless radio'''
  a. GSM AMR-WB (UMTS 3G)
  a. GSM Full rate (Voice)
  a. G.723.1 (Video Conferencing)
  a. G.729 (VoIP)
  a. G.711 (PCM)
  a. G.726 (International Voice)
  a. G.722 (VoIP)
  a. GSM-AMR (Voice)
  a. GSM-AMR WB+ (3G Data)
  a. G.728 (Standard Voice)
1. '''Confirm all protocols employ the following advanced features'''
  a. Voice detection
  a. Echo cancellation
